title: AE61038: Aeroelasticity - Quick Facts

Course name | AEROELASTICITY

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE31002 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsIntroduction, degrees of freedom, response of single degree of freedom system, Laplace transform, harmonic excitation virtual work, Lagrange s equation, multiple degree of freedom, undamped modes and frequencies; Static aeroelasticity, divergence of wind tunnel models, wall-sting and strut-mounted models, control reversal, classical flutter analysis, one and two-degree of freedom flutter, flutter boundary characteristics.
